meanings.sent1: The bride wore a lacey veil on her wedding day.
meanings.sent2: The tablecloth looked beautiful with its lacey trim.
meanings.sent3: The lacey curtains fluttered in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her lacey dress was like a delicate web spun by a skilled spider.
meanings.sent5: The lacey pattern on the cake made it look elegant and sophisticated.

meanings.definition: Having a delicate or intricate design
meanings.sent1: The lacey necklace was a gift from her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The antique mirror had a lacey frame that added to its charm.
meanings.sent3: The lacey snowflake ornament sparkled on the Christmas tree.
meanings.sent4: Her lacey handwriting was so intricate that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The lacey pattern on the wallpaper gave the room a touch of elegance.

meanings.sent1: The lacey fabric felt soft against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The lacey gloves added a touch of sophistication to her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The lacey clouds in the sky looked like delicate cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: Her lacey scarf fluttered in the wind like a graceful dancer.
meanings.sent5: The lacey pattern on the pillow gave it a luxurious feel.
